definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Would you like a cover for your coat?
sentences.chinese: 需要罩子蓋住您的外衣嗎？

sentences.english: It is a solitary animal that spends daylight roosting under a palm leaf, and then flies high at night, hunting moths and other flying insects.
sentences.chinese: 它們長有一大片的皮瓣，在睡覺時可用作遮臉的罩子。

sentences.english: She drew a cover over the typewriter .
sentences.chinese: 她拿過罩子將打字機套上。

sentences.english: With that, he tore the cover off the cage.
sentences.chinese: 說着，他扯下了籠子的罩子。

sentences.english: It was the shadow produced by a chimney-pipe of sheet iron, with a hood, which rose above a neighboring roof.
sentences.chinese: 但只是隔壁人家屋頂上一個帶罩子的鐵皮煙囪的影子。

sentences.english: Side Cowl - Cover around the sides of the engine.
sentences.chinese: 側整流罩一發動機兩側的罩子。

sentences.english: They have a large flap of skin that they use as a mask to cover their face when they sleep.
sentences.chinese: 它們長有一大片的皮瓣，在睡覺時可用作遮臉的罩子。

sentences.english: Lee: Well, maybe you'd like it better, if we covered it with a gingham throw.
sentences.chinese: 也許你會更喜歡它如果我們把它罩上一個棉布罩子。

definition: shield/(currency) Vietnamese dong/currency unit of several countries (Indonesian rupiah, Dutch gulden etc)
cover of lamp/lampshade/glass cover of oil lamp
